subject: Re: [junit] how run a big file inwhich a lot of import files using junit
msgSnippet: Can you please rephrase your question. Maybe you could split your question in steps. Also post the exceptions for the testcases which have failed. You can view
messageBody:
Can you please rephrase your question. Maybe you could split your question
in steps.
Also post the exceptions for the testcases which have failed. You can view
the exceptions for a failed testcase when you click on the testcase in Test
Hierarchy.
This would give me a clear idea of your problem.

----- Original Message -----
From: "vivek baranwal" <vivek1_mca@...>
To: <junit@yahoogroups.com>
Sent: Wednesday, August 20, 2003 4:05 PM
Subject: [junit] how run a big file inwhich a lot of import files using
junit


> hi all
> i have a AllServerTests.java class . i want to test it in junit. when we
run it given its name in junit window then in Test Hierarchy all import file
names which occur in this file come like
> com.plateform.source.AllServerTests and in it testupdatequery,.......
occur.
> but it gives error with red sign .i think that import classes can not
understand by it of my project.pls help me.
> vivek
